sentence: Over  a  Zoom  call,  he  told  NPR  he  was  visiting  his  90-year-old  mother  in  northern  Gaza  —  about  two  miles  from  the  border  with  Israel    –  when,  on  Oct.  7,  Hamas  insurgents  crossed  into  Israel,  killing  more  than  1,400  people  and  taking  more  than  200  others  hostage.
"In  the  four  weeks  since  the  conflict  began,  more  than  10,000  people  have  died  in  Gaza,  according  to  the  Ministry  of  Health.
